title: The Brutal Clarity of This Result
author: John Gruber
excerpt: In retrospect, I didn't take Donald Trump's election seriously enough in 2016.It was easy to dismiss the victory of a clownish, reality television star and failed businessman as a fluke of an 18th century constitutional anti-majoritarian rule.After all, he decidedly lost the national popular
text: Rep. Elise Stefanik (R-NY) is on the short list to become his next ambassador to the United Nations, Politico reports. “Stefanik has repeatedly attacked the United Nations over accusations that… Nate Silver notes the actual election map we got on Tuesday was the map that occurred most often in his election forecast simulations. Bob Casey,” the AP reports. Save to Favorites “President-elect Trump’s victory was driven by gains among young voters that the campaign targeted through a media blitz in the final months leading up to the general election,” Axios reports…. “Eight years ago, conservative Christians wondered if Donald Trump, who had just been elected president, would truly be their champion. Said Jeffries: “It has yet to be decided who will control the House of Representatives in the… Electoral-Vote.com: “The dominant story of the election thus far is the turnout. Donald Trump collected 62 million votes in 2016, grew that to 74 million in 2020, and will check… Just after the election results came in, David Plouffe took a dig at President Biden: “We dug out of a deep hole but not enough.” He then deleted his X…

Rep. Elise Stefanik (R-NY) is on the short list to become his next ambassador to the United Nations, Politico reports. “Stefanik has repeatedly attacked the United Nations over accusations that…

Nate Silver notes the actual election map we got on Tuesday was the map that occurred most often in his election forecast simulations. Save to Favorites

“President-elect Donald Trump has tapped his campaign senior adviser Susie Wiles as White House chief of staff,” Politico reports. “Wiles, who amassed outsized influence as Trump’s de facto campaign manager,…

“David McCormick has won the Pennsylvania Senate race, defeating the Democratic incumbent Sen. Bob Casey,” the AP reports. Save to Favorites

“President-elect Trump’s victory was driven by gains among young voters that the campaign targeted through a media blitz in the final months leading up to the general election,” Axios reports….
